0.cdata!:
Tunisia - Projet d'Irrigation de la
            Tunisie Centrale

abstracts.cdata!:
The primary objectives of the project
            were to: (a) increase agricultural production in Central
            Tunisia; (b) increase farm incomes; (c) create employment;
            and (d) implement a coherent and sustained water resources
            policy through the development of water users'
            associations capable of managing public irrigation schemes
            and through the support of private initiative to develop and
            use groundwater resources efficiently.
